general_advisory: After threshing the crop need to be sundried to 14% and 12% moisture for consumption and seed purpose respectively. In case of rodent infestation has been found on the threshing floor and in the field itself use poison bait. Foggy weather may lead to increased infestation of Powdery Mildew. Spray Mixture of water with Thiophanate Methyl or Tebuconazole.

advisory: Early sown mustard are likely to be affected by Aphids due to foggy weather. Spray Thiamethoxam or Imidachoprid in water.
Due to the ongoing foggy weather condition, sucking pest might infest Chilli crop. For management of sucking pest (Aphid, Thrips) in chilli, Spray Imidachloprid in water.
Maintain at least a 6 ft. height for better hibernation due cold season. Reduce fish feed by 20% due to reduced intake of feed due to low temperature.
In winter season give attention towards Bio-security of chickens and stay safe from bird flu.
